title: The Saint: The fiction makers
brief_description: Starring Roger Moore as Simon Templar, fiction becomes fact when a writer’s best-selling thrillers are used by a ruthless gang as a blueprint for a crime. Using the novellist’s brilliant imagination the gang plan to rob an underground vault containing a fortune in gold and jewels. But when The Saint appears as the novelists bodyguard, events take an unexpected turn… and he finds himself caught in a life and death race against time. Includes a 50 minute b/w TV episode of “The Saint”
